biotools.summary: CleanBSequences is a R package that cleans biological sequences massively, quickly, without errors and without internet connection. Biological sequences cleaning is performed by aligning the forward and / or revers primers or ends of cloning vectors with the sequences to be cleaned. After the alignment, new subsequences are generated without biological fragment not desired by the user.
